node.title: Exploding the Gay Myth! The Victor J. Adamson Story
node.description: Ron Woolsey believed he was born gay, and he immersed himself into the gay lifestyle. However, after experiencing the love and grace of God he was willing to turn from his homosexual lifestyle. As a writer, pastor, radio evangelist, and international speaker he shares with others, struggling with homosexuality, that God can help them become overcomers too.
